.countdown-timer{display:none;margin:0;padding:0}.countdown-timer__title{display:none}.countdown-timer__text{display:inline}.countdown-timer__days span,.countdown-timer__hours span,.countdown-timer__minutes span,.countdown-timer__seconds span{font-weight:500}.countdown-timer__days-tens,.countdown-timer__hours-tens,.countdown-timer__minutes-tens,.countdown-timer__seconds-tens{letter-spacing:-.3rem}.countdown-timer.themed{margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;text-align:center}@media (min-width:768px){.countdown-timer.themed{margin-left:0;text-align:left}}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__title{display:block;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:500;font-size:1rem;line-height:1.125;letter-spacing:-.07px}@media (min-width:480px){.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__title{margin-bottom:.5rem}}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__text{display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:-webkit-fit-content;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-tens{margin-right:3px}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-tens{width:calc(50% - 3px);padding:3px 2px;color:#fff;font-size:1.34375rem;line-height:1.26087;letter-spacing:-.1px;background-color:#062942;border-radius:5px}@media (min-width:480px){.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-tens,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-tens{padding:4px 5px;font-size:1.4375rem}}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes-ones,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds-ones{margin-left:3px}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;width:100%;max-width:65px;color:#062942;font-weight:300;font-size:.625rem;line-height:1.8;letter-spacing:-.05px;text-align:center}@media (min-width:480px){.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__days,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__hours,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__minutes,.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__seconds{max-width:60px;font-size:.6875rem;line-height:1.81818}}.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__colon{width:17px;height:34px;color:#062942;font-weight:500;font-size:1.3125rem;letter-spacing:-.1px;text-align:center}@media (min-width:480px){.countdown-timer.themed .countdown-timer__colon{width:20px;height:37px;font-size:1.4375rem}}.for-countdown{display:none}[data-has-countdown=true] .countdown-timer{display:inline}[data-has-countdown=true] .for-countdown{display:block}[data-has-countdown=true] .non-countdown{display:none}
